entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Morden AAFC 1:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
